title: I wish to start a YouTube channel where I cover songs. How do I do this safely? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you want to do something that involves video game music, you can try bringing up music from games like “Donkey Kong Country: Dixie’s Double Trouble!” In order to not get caught, since that music is no longer owned by Nintendo. You should dig for music that is no longer owned by anyone basically.
